channel.title: update issue - fasttrack repository issue
channel.description:
issue:
> SOCKS proxy socks5h://127.0.0.1:9050 could not connect to fasttrack.debian.net (0.0.0.0:0) due to: general SOCKS server failure (1) [IP: 127.0.0.1 9050]
Or...
> Err:4 http://HTTPS///fasttrack.debian.net/debian bullseye-fasttrack InRelease > 500 SSL error: wrong version number [IP: 127.0.0.1 3142]
Or similar.
workaround here (update 2): [https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates#fasttrack_repository_issues](https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Operating_System_Software_and_Updates#fasttrack_repository_issues)
(Whonix is based on Kicksecure.)

item.title: update issue - fasttrack repository issue
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Issue happening again in a similar way.

Read full topic

item.title: update issue - fasttrack repository issue
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This has been resolved by Debian.

Whonix (GW+WS) 16, issue with fasttrack.debian.net (unexpected TLS packet) Support
Ah - Awesome thank you. Side note - The issue appears to be resolved in Debian (I am no longer getting the TLS error from fasttrack)

Read full topic
